title: BBC.A.Week.In.The.Wild.720p.HDTV.x264.AAC.MVGroup.org
description:
A Week in the Wild

Travel Documentary hosted by Steven Mangan, published by BBC in 2016 - English narration
 
http://docuwiki.net/images/e/e5/A-Week-in-the-Wild-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

A Week in the Wild
In this programme, three celebrities take on iconic, long-distance hikes in some of the world's most remote locations.
On this expedition, ex-politician Stanley Johnson, TV presenter Melanie Sykes and German comedian Henning Wehn tackle Mexico's little explored but famous Copper Canyon. It is a stunning wilderness in the heart of the Sierra Madre Mountains of North West Mexico. Over the course of a week, our trio experience an enticing challenge through difficult and remote terrain, an unforgiving climate and unfamiliar culture. They carve a route through breathtaking scenery, endless steep valleys, gorges and plateaux,
